channel.title: Are most of the MoparScape community unwilling to learn?
channel.description:
Well, Taharok once said that most of the MoparScape community are retarded.
Just wondering, do you think this is true?

item.title: Are most of the MoparScape community unwilling to learn?
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:166, topic:320978”]It’s all about the age of the people, no doubt. Who can expect a 12 year old to do all this work on their own? All the learning and perseverance that is needed… It just doesn’t happen often. You get some rare people that surprise us once in a while, but like said, they are rare.

Edit: To stress, you can’t change people either. No matter how much you want this community to change, trying thereto only drives the community apart. You either learn to let live or you are better off not being here.[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Are most of the MoparScape community unwilling to learn?

item.title: Are most of the MoparScape community unwilling to learn?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

It’s all about the age of the people, no doubt. Who can expect a 12 year old to do all this work on their own? All the learning and perseverance that is needed… It just doesn’t happen often. You get some rare people that surprise us once in a while, but like said, they are rare.

Edit: To stress, you can’t change people either. No matter how much you want this community to change, trying thereto only drives the community apart. You either learn to let live or you are better off not being here.

Read full topic

item.title: Are most of the MoparScape community unwilling to learn?

item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

abatssk8ter:

I don’t think they’re retarded, i think they lack common sense and expect to come here and be spoon fed.

they r just lazy, very lazy.
Ill admit, i was like that once too, but i tried to learn, and now i can do SOME things by myself, because i learned some stuff, actually took looks at the codes etc
plus i taught myself a little just by looking through codes and understanding them :o

item.title: Are most of the MoparScape community unwilling to learn?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Not all 13 year olds are retarded, I learned about the pwnsome search feature at the age of 10, and was actually willing to learn and apply skills learned from others.
But seriously, nowadays everyone is willing to hire a coder and claim the credit for themselves, and nobody wants to actually learn, some people still try to work but are discouraged by the others who get it easy, and so fall into bad habits themselves.

item.title: Are most of the MoparScape community unwilling to learn?
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

Quite simply, yes.
When you look at the servers getting released here, you will find that 99% of the servers only contain features which are simply c+p’d from tutorials and snippets. Whenever there is a bump in the road, people imediatly turn to the help section.
When looking at the tutorials, the tutorials that tell you exactly what to do get the most views, most comments, and get praised the most. Where as the tutorials which actually require the reader to do something themselves, well, they just crawl into a dark corner and die most of the time.

So yeah, atleast half the community is unwilling to learn. People want results, and they want them fast. They don’t care how they could create something themselves when there are other people that can create it for them (development section like 75% of the time.)

Just my 2 cents.

Read full topic
item.source: Are most of the MoparScape community unwilling to learn?
